name: Dreaming Bad
description:
A Breaking Good inspired parody Yume Nikki fangame thats actually about Walt losing his steam account 

 I made this within the timelimit of the first season of Breaking Bad (will probably update when i learn this software), if you take this seriously you have more problems than me.

Please note that i didnt make any of these characters and they are parodying Breaking Bad, which is a really goddamn good show and you should watch it
